name: Geometrical Algorithms in PHP
short_description: Gemal is a php library which works with gdlib 2 to perform several gemoetrical tasks. the intention is on the development hand to find (new) fast algorithms for a wide variety of tasks and on the users side to use it for broad visualizations on the web.
